Articles.Content:
This is just a thread for stupid things you have seen (primarily in real life, but anywhere is ok. Oh wait, except KSP because of that stupid forum rule)

I guess one stupid thing would have to be on a box of Michelina's microwave pizza snack bite things, the directions said to microwave on high for 2:00 minutes to 2:05 minutes. Really? Is that extra 5 seconds really going to make a difference? Just in case, I put them on for 2:03 (I rounded 2.5 seconds up to three) because I like to be precise, and just because I thought it was kind of funny. 

What stupid and idiotic things have you seen?
Politics. And that’s all I can say about that here….

pkunzip.zip

unarj.arj

Edited April 16, 2022 by kerbiloid

2 years of stupid, none of which moved the dial at all.

(I'm in my 50s, the last 2 years are the stupidest thing I have ever seen)

Edited April 21, 2022 by tater

i just watched moonfall. i think the movie would have been better if they just skipped the first half where all they did is spew scientifically questionable bs in a lame attempt to setup the rest of the movie. after all the work the expanse did to raise the bar, sucks to see them throw it on the floor again. as bad as it was, its still not the worst movie ive seen in the last few years.
